Posts.EditableText:
Roads are shady under coconut trees and many resorts with beautiful rows of coconut trees along the beach.

Mui Ne is an ideal place for de-stressing, resting and relaxation. Travelers can swim in the blue water of the sea, slip on the sand dunes, relax in swimming pools of resorts and kitesurf.

Highlights:

– Enjoying with the local attractions in Mui Ne like Red Sand Dunes, Bong Lai Tien Canh, Fishing Village, Wine Castle, Phi Long Sand Art…

– Enjoying wonderful moments at the resort in Mui Ne.

– Exploring Mui Ne at night and enjoy the specialties of seafood from local fishing village Bo Ke.

– In addition to the above attractions, the Mui Ne beach has long coastline and photographs with the coast in the beautiful bending with the cool and fresh by the sea breeze, it’s very wonderful if you have time to indulge the atmosphere of the sea by walking along the coast.

Read more: Tour Phan Thiet 2 ngay 1 dem

DAY 1: HCMC– MUI NE (200km) (B/L/D):

05.00 Am: We will pick you up at your office and begin “Mui Ne Tour 02 days 01 night”.

07.30 Am: You will stop at Long Khánh district (Dong Nai province) to have breakfast (a traditional food of Vietnamese) such as Pho, Hu Tieu, Fried egg, Noodles…Continue our trip.

On the way, our tour guide will tell you about some places such as Chua Chan Mountain, Gia Lao Pagoda, Thay Thim temple, Champa Land…and you will play a lot of games with the tour guide, more gifts are waiting for you.

10.00 Am: We stop at Phi Long Sand Art. Over there, you will enjoy some masterpieces. They were made from sand and water by handicap people. Next, you are being to sight Wine Castle. This castle was made by Europe Style. You will be sample some red wine, sight-seeing the cellar, party table was set up very beautiful…(self-sufficient).

12.00 pm: Having Lunch at restaurant.

14.00 pm: Check-in the Resort and take some rest over here.

17.45 pm: Going to the restaurant to have dinner

We come back to Resort. In the evening, you can go along the beach for sight-seeing and tasty seafood. Overnight at Mui Ne.

DAY 02: MUI NE SAND DUNES– WINE CASTLE – HCMC (B/L):

05.00 Am: We gather in reception and go to Mui Ne Sand Dunes. Over here, you will slide on the sand by skateboard (homemade) and take some pictures. This’s the best time for you here.

Come back to resort to having breakfast, swim in the sea or swimming pool. Next, going to “Bong Lai Tien Canh” to enjoy the natural life. You can walk between the red ravine, sigh-seeing thousands of stalactites, throwing your eyesight to see a skyline. It’s really a marvelous feeling (self-sufficient).

11.00 Am: Come back to resort to check-out. Having dinner at the restaurant and come back to HCMC.

On the way, the tour guide leads you in basic of fish sauce (Mui Ne specialty) to buy some things, such as fish sauce, dried anchovy, Half dried cuttlefish, dragon fruit, sweet tamarind,…or go to Phan Thiet market to buy some ones like this.

18.00 pm: Come back to your office, finish “Mui Ne Tour 02 Days 01 Night”. See you next time on all the ways of SAIGONTOURISM. Thank you for choosing our services.

Note:

  • Alternative accommodation can be arranged as customize.
  • Bringing your ID/passport/Birth certificate of a child
  • Resort’s check in time at 02:00 pm and check out time at 12:00 noon.
  • The schedule could be changed but the contents of the programme remain unchanged

Recommend: Tour Phan Thiet 3 ngay 2 dem

Posts.EditableText:
> If I create a game, using the Website. How do I download the game to my own PC ?

In Quest? You can download the ASLX file to continue editing from the "My Games" list, where there's a download button next to edit. If you want to download the compiled game as a .quest file ready to play, you would go to the game listing after publishing it (you can publish a game but have it only available to people you share the link with) and click "Download" in the right sidebar.

> Game PUBG PC

Not sure what that means. Are you a spambot who forgot to include a link?
Posts.HTML:
If I create a game, using the Website. How do I download the game to my own PC ?

In Quest? You can download the ASLX file to continue editing from the "My Games" list, where there's a download button next to edit. If you want to download the compiled game as a .quest file ready to play, you would go to the game listing after publishing it (you can publish a game but have it only available to people you share the link with) and click "Download" in the right sidebar.

Game PUBG PC

Not sure what that means. Are you a spambot who forgot to include a link?
